headline: Constellation Brands to Present at the 2025 Deutsche Bank Global Consumer Conference on June 3, 2025
summary: ROCHESTER, N.Y., May 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE: STZ), a leading beverage alcohol company, announced today that Bill Newlands, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Garth Hankinson, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the 2025 Deutsche Bank Global Consumer Conference on Tuesday, June 3, 2025 in Paris, France.
